author: eclark
msg: HBASE-9333 hbase.hconnection.threads.max should not be configurable else you get RejectedExecutionException

author: kpreisser
msg: Fix what seemed to be a wrong usage of "project" variable.
This fixes viewing changelog.xml in IE and Firefox where previously things like the LHS menu etc. were not visible (whereas they were visible in Chrome).
I do not know why this has worked in Ant's XSLT task before.
